casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timmy SPEIGHT. No. 491PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC. Margaret Creasy Ciardella, Hampstead, Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Speight.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of October 2006 by Attorney General to Strike Argument II of Defendant's Supplemental Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2006."
